Cash Management Services : Main functions with swift based transaction (Outward Telegraphic Transfer, RTGS, Cash Withdrawal Services, Pay Orders, Bulk Pay Orders & all cash management based products).
Trade Finance Services : Main functions based on the trade platform (Letter of Credit, Shipping Guarantee, Bank Guarantee & all trade based products).

Product: Banking Solution (Internet banking / CEFT)
Fortuna Finance is an enterprise multi-channel online banking solution that enables banks to provide a full range of banking services and content to customers with different user profiles, efficiently and reliably. CEFT allow customers to perform transaction between different banks

jobs.description:
Product : Just Pay
Just pay mobile app provides customer with multiple options to pay from any bank
accounts. This eliminates the need to carry debit cards of different banks and provides
the easy access to all bank accounts though a single application

Core Technologies :
Application Server  - Apache Tomcat 9
Language - Java 8
Database Server - mysql
Technologies - Spring Boot, Spring data

Product Name : Phantom
Phantom is software which automate letter box marketing business. It includes job booking, maintaining ware houses, managing distributors, tracking distribution status etc. 

Software/ Technolog Used: 
Java 1.7
Spring Core
JPA
 EJB
Extjs

Clients – Salmat pty ltd

Product Name:  ISO - Transbridge
Transbridge is designed to plug any ATM network and core banking backend. Financial institutes need a bridge to connect back end with third party ATMs.  ATMs communicate with their backend via ISO 8583 messages. 
ISO Transabridge is designed to break and construct ISO 8583 messages. It is a matter of time to implement interfaces to break vendor specific ISO formats and backend transaction handling. We have followed Factory and Proxy design patterns to overcome the issue of connecting ATM networks and back end. 
The product is released with a monitoring tool and ISO message generator.  Monitoring tool is used to monitor sever status and transaction history. ISO message generator is designed to act as ATM for testing connectivity and transactions.
Software/ Technology Used:
•	Java 1.7 , Spring core/Dao
•	Sl4j / logback - logging
•	JUnit - unit testing
•	Maven 3 project management 
•	Sonar - code quality
Clients – LOLC, CLC, MelstartRegal

Responsibilities (ISO – Transbridge, FIX –Transbridge, Banking Solution – USSD intergration): 
•	Design the most appropriate architecture for the solution.
•	Technology finding for implementation: Research & Development, Proof of  concept to select the most appropriate technology
•	Implement the base framework of the product. 
•	The responsibilities for planning and managing the work are split between members of team and review their day to day development.
•	Derive and deliver Technical Solution and take a leadership role in doing so and R&D.
•	Troubleshoot problems and implement appropriate solutions to problems
•	Participate in periodic review meetings with the Senior Software Architect to discuss project status, system design and product requirements
•	Overall Technical responsibility of the projects assigned

general.headline: Associate Technical Lead at WSO2 working for Stream Processor and Analytics team
general.description:
I am a software engineer at WSO2 and part of the team en route to make the best middleware platform of the world. It is always interesting to invent technology, solutions which will be used globally. I am mainly passionate about Big Data and real-time event processing. Analyzing data, converting to information and visualizing them is always a fascinating process.

Specialties: CEP, Big Data, Java

jobs.description:
Working as a member of WSO2 Complex Event Processor project which focuses on
      real-time event processing. Work includes technologies like WSO2 Siddhi, Apache
      
      Storm and LMAX Disruptor.

Currently I am following Bsc. Engineering degree program at University of Moratuwa.
      
      My field of specialization is Computer Science and Engineering

Currently I am contributing to Apache Software Foundation under Apache ManifoldCF
      
      project.

Projects:
Big data analytics and visualization using different frameworks
A project to analyze page view details of a website using Apache Hive, which
comes in a csv file and visualize results using different reporting frameworks such
as Pentaho, Jasper and GoodData.

WSO2 Enterprise Service Bus(ESB) integration tests
A project to develop integration test cases for WSO2 ESB. Test Scenarios were
given and we were supposed to develop test cases to ensure functionality.

WSO2 Complex Event Processing(CEP) performance improvement and
documentation
Under the performance improvement project modifications were done to WSO2
Databridge component to minimize event conversions and thus increase
performance.
Under documentation project code samples and documentation were developed for
WSO2 CEP new product release.

Technologies : Java, XML, Apache Hadoop, Apache Hive, Apache Synapse, Apache
Thrift, Apache Axis2, TestNG, JUnit, OSGi, SVN, Maven

I contributed to Eclipse Foundation as a part of GSoC 2012 and still contributing as a
      
      community contributor.

allSkills: Software Engineering, Java, Eclipse, Algorithms, OOP, Programming, Big Data, C, XML, NetBeans, Android, Apache, Matlab, MySQL, C#, CEP, ManifoldCF
